ValidationRule.description: Prevent Records From Having to Exclude All Vendors
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(All_WM_Vendors__c = true, WM_Vendor__c= false, All_3rd_Party_Vendor__c = true, Child_VID_Check_Include_Uncheck_Exclude__c = false, RecordType.Name = 'STP Eligibility')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All WM and 3rd Party vendors cannot be excluded.
